welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hermiston, a charming city known for its scenic views, friendly locals, and vibrant culture. We invite you to experience all that Hermiston has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights to nearby cities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
